title: 3 minutes is not enough time to reconnect
body:
Regarding the Remake option, you get 3 minutes before your team can initiate a /remake vote. I don't think that's nearly enough time. 
I queued up for a ranked game and when the game went to the loading screen, it said I was disconnected. 
I started monitoring my Wi-Fi connection and restarted league. Still, I was getting a disconnected message, but my diagnostics was not picking up any issues.
Tried restarting again, but this time I'm hit with a slow log in, further delaying me.
Finally I load again, but now it said the game no longer exists. 

It's disgruntling to try your hardest to reconnect to find that the 3 minutes are over.

replies.body: I agree, 3 minutes doesn't work at all, Riot needs to knock it down to 2. If you get to lane 30 seconds after the minions do, you might as well bend over unless your lane opponent is a lot worse than you.

You can leave feedback on the /Remake system on the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) if you'd like. 

____
Regarding your technical issues joining games, I suggest checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are 100% compatible with Leauge. Let me know if those steps helped.

Okay, I tried queueing an ARAM.
I got another "cannot connect to the server" message.
Instead of restarting League, I tried to reconnect, and now I'm in game.
